DOC.brief_summary: Participants expose 3 condition , random order : 1 . A Facebook page 70 % post relate food . 2 . A Facebook page 20 % post relate food . 3 . A control condition ( colour quietly ) . During condition participant provide identical snack . The snack weigh condition , determine whether change food intake across 3 condition .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Social Media Food Intake Behaviour
